entry: TODO:I'm boiling!
TODO:My flesh... it burns!
TODO:Get me out of this infernal cookpot!
TODO:I don't want to be eaten!
TODO:Aiyeeee! The pain!
TODO:Strike the pot! Strike the pot!
TODO:I fight for love!
TODO:For the tides!
TODO:Do not threaten my Queen!
TODO:I will live forever here, with my Love!
TODO:These waters are my home now!
TODO:My eyes clear!
TODO:I had the most tranquil dream.
TODO:The tides...they took me!
TODO:Wh-where am I?
TODO:I...I am sorry my friends!
TODO:...can't breathe!
TODO:The fathoms call me down!
TODO:Release me! I cannot swim!
TODO:I reject your pact!
TODO:The tide washes over me!
TODO:Crushing weight...
TODO:Those of faith have no tolerance for those with my condition.
TODO:I will not serve with this... creature.
TODO:GRAAAGGHHH!
TODO:Snrrff.
TODO:HWRAWRRRRR!
TODO:ERRRRAAAAAGHHH!
TODO:GWERRRRRRGGHHH!
TODO:SHKA-TULURRGHH!
TODO:Rrrolf.
TODO:IA! IARRRGH!!!
TODO:FRRAAAGGNNNN!
TODO:EEEEERRROARRRGGH!
TODO:AARRARRRGGGH!
TODO:SKREEEEE!
TODO:Renewal!
TODO:IT IS UNBEARABLE!
TODO:THE SHADOWS COME FOR ME AT LAST!
TODO:I KNEW IT!
TODO:I COULD NOT BEAR THIS BURDEN!
TODO:I SHOULD KILL YOU ALL! I SHOULD--
TODO:WHY DID I LET MYSELF COME TO THIS...
TODO:ALL IS LOST...
TODO:THE MYSTERY, AT LAST!
TODO:How can one stand against all of this?
TODO:We are doomed!
TODO:Oh, justice has failed me!
TODO:I... thought death would be honorable...
TODO:Where is the white light? I see only blackness...
TODO:Why now, facing death, do I crave a different life?
TODO:Terrible! ... So terrible!
TODO:Caught! Trapped!
TODO:What foolishness brought me here?!
TODO:We must go for help! Err... better help than us!
TODO:Curses! I should have brought the blunderbuss!
TODO:What I would not give for a drop of liquid courage...
TODO:I am no stranger to death, but how can one bear these horrors!
TODO:I have seen much pain. And yet the thought chills me.
TODO:Blood in my eyes... blood in my throat.. blood...
TODO:... pulse quickens... humours churn... body reacts...
TODO:So this is the death-bed fear, is it?
TODO:I am not up to this task, Light forgive me!
TODO:I will not fear martyrdom. I will not!
TODO:Light, grant me passage through these cursed hallsâ€¦
TODO:Verse XXI: Heathens alone fear death...
TODO:Spare me this one time, oh Light. Please spare me...
TODO:My mind flies in an empty abyss! So horrible!
TODO:I see the blackened vault! Vast, limitless, terrible!
TODO:I feel terror grasping at my soul!
TODO:Fear is a mental construct... I must deny it!
TODO:My control is fading! It is coming through!
TODO:I must away! These morbid paths curdle my blood!
TODO:Curses! A blacker fate I dare not imagine!
TODO:My mind conjures the baying of wolves! What horrors!
TODO:This place suffers not folk as fair as myself! Away, away!
TODO:Not but once have I stood in fear as nakedly as this!
TODO:Curse this place!
TODO:No shame in folding early. I like to keep my winnings.
TODO:We've been dealt out! Let us go!
TODO:...
TODO:It's a bad hand. That's all there is to it.
TODO:No... I will not cower! I WILL NOT!
TODO:The elders did not warn me of this...
TODO:I...must... concentrate! I cannot be afraid!
TODO:It is not so cold. And yet I tremble...
TODO:You can do this... You were BORN for this!
TODO:Err... Eh heh. Ha. Err....
TODO:Ha haaa! Haaaa! Aaaaaaaaah!
TODO:Well, so much for bravery.
TODO:Some idiot once told me all bravery comes from fear.
TODO:Which prancing fop led me down here anyway??
TODO:A tunnel carved in ice. A guttering torch.
TODO:Swarms of summer larks, fleeing the autumn wind.
TODO:All must come to ruin. There is no escape.
TODO:Do not resist the end. Anguish is the sure result.
TODO:Now we come to it... The vision is cloaked in black.
TODO:H-how flawed, my strategy!
TODO:We must fall back! We must retreat!
TODO:The classic strategems elude me!
TODO:Retreat, damn you! RETREAT!
TODO:Turn back, we are too far!
TODO:I can feel Death's sights on my heart!
TODO:The front line will fall!
TODO:N-no! No more!
TODO:Nothing can stop these fiends!
TODO:Defeat! Despair! DEATH!
TODO:Terror overwhelms duty!
TODO:The pursuit of Justice leads only to agony and death!
TODO:This simple beast fears death as I do.
TODO:Let it be swift and painless!
TODO:Each step leads deeper into this waking nightmare!
TODO:FLEE! FLEE WHILE YOU CAN!
TODO:What are we still doing here?! We must leave or PERISH!
TODO:Do you not see how our fate is sealed? HOW THE DIE IS CAST?!
TODO:My will's iron is bent and my blood is like icewater.
TODO:There is no midnight as black as this vision.
TODO:My sights shiver, my blood stops!
TODO:We are the prey! This is their hunt!
TODO:This is a trap!
TODO:Horrors! Unclean sights!
TODO:Drop the gold! Drop the supplies! Drop everything...and RUN!
TODO:Cursed censer! It exudes his essence and corrupts this expedition!
TODO:What a nightmarish fate - to be lost and forgotten like ancient relics!
TODO:I...I would give all my gold to be gone from here!
TODO:Flee! I will forfeit my cut but we must flee!
TODO:Even my blade whispers of doom!
TODO:Stay where I can see you! I know your mind!
TODO:Silence! Demons whisper in the dark...
TODO:This is a test of my faith! I sense it!
TODO:Persecutors! I live by the law of truth!
TODO:This has all been a trap!
TODO:I knew I shouldn't have signed that contract...
TODO:I hear more behind us! Hurry!
TODO:Stay on the move... stay on the move...
TODO:Cease your prattle! Or they will find us!
TODO:I see how you all conspire to end me!
TODO:This has all been a decoy to steal my formulas! Deny it!
TODO:You will not have my secrets! NO YOU SHALL NOT!
TODO:I hear the miasma... it whispers of suffering!
TODO:Stop breathing on me! I'll catch cold!
TODO:You are all godless, luring me to my end!
TODO:You test me? Shall I demonstrate the power of faith?
TODO:Stop staring at me. I know your mind!
TODO:Verse XXV: trust not armed men, for they seek to wound.
TODO:You mock me behind my back! Do not deny it!
TODO:I must stay ever-vigilant, lest It take me...
TODO:Is it the wind that howls so unmercifully...?
TODO:It is here. It lurks at the periphery of my mind...
TODO:We must hurry! Fetid aberrations nip at our heels!
TODO:The others fear my power... I must remain wary of them.
TODO:Twenty-five percent, says I. You will sell me no dog!
TODO:I sense the flick of a viper's tongue. Beware of treachery...
TODO:Their eyes shift about. I daresay a trick is afoot...
TODO:Betrayal... I must cast a keen eye over my shoulder...
TODO:I assure you, the worst is far from over.
TODO:(growl)
TODO:Cut me in proper. Or else.
TODO:Don't you cheat me... the deal was twenty-five percent.
TODO:Streak's about to run dry. You'll see.
TODO:hmph...you are all sneaks.
TODO:The spirits here are hungry. I feel their breath...
TODO:My soul stands out like a flame. I am exposed...
TODO:Secretly, they covet my strength. Soon, they will show it.
TODO:Beasts stalk the edge. Can you smell their hate?
TODO:They have the eyes of nervous tigers...
TODO:Maybe just cut all their throats... To be sure.
TODO:So you've finally tricked the trickster.
TODO:They take me for a fool. ... Fair, I suppose.
TODO:What a fool I've been. Ha. Ha ha. ... Hmm.
TODO:Let them stand behind me?! AH HA HA HAAAAA!
TODO:Lions in the savanna. A lone campfire.
TODO:Red rubies glitter in the trove of night.
TODO:A white rabbit. Heart pounding, limbs ablaze...
TODO:We are not alone here.
TODO:They will come for us soon. It is inevitable.
TODO:Dissenters - you spoil my tactics!
TODO:Eyes down, Private!
TODO:They aim to sneak up on us!
TODO:Cowards! Finks! Underminers! You are revealed!
TODO:Treachery in the ranks!
TODO:Surrounded by servants of Darkness!
TODO:Which of you bumped my arm?!
TODO:Who here parlays with shadows?
TODO:Deceive me at your peril!
TODO:Comrades?! Enemies?! All have it in for me!
TODO:Corruption seethes around us!
TODO:Stick close, girl! Lawless miscreants lurk at every turn...
TODO:It's a sting! We're surrounded!
TODO:They're out to get me - can feel it in my gut.
TODO:What is it, girl? Have they turned on us?
TODO:Of course, why didn't I see it sooner!? Betrayers all of you!
TODO:You would abandon me alone here, would you not?
TODO:Out of respect, wait until I am fully dead before picking me over like vultures.
TODO:I trust you less than the common vagrants who patrol my city.
TODO:I have oft wondered if evil is drawn to my better half.
TODO:Hah! One of you presumes to be able to stalk me!
TODO:I sense a snake about!
TODO:Surround me if you dare!
TODO:Something follows! It is near!
TODO:Which of you covets my skull for their mantel?!
TODO:My master's influence transcends his prison!
TODO:The relics are mine! Mine, I tell you!
TODO:Keep away! Stay where I can see you!
TODO:Keep your knives in sight! You won't get me!
TODO:Do you seek my gold? Come and get it!
TODO:Let the pain come! I will soak it in!
TODO:I revel in despair!
TODO:I will bear any wound!
TODO:The pain is my penitence!
TODO:I'll not avert mine eyes. T'would offend my vows.
TODO:The flesh doth test my will. It shall not break it!
TODO:To the faithful, scars are but a memento!
TODO:Let the pain come! I will soak it in!
TODO:I am no shrinking violet when it comes to blood!
TODO:Ha! What's one more scar?
TODO:No less than I deserve...
TODO:Take aim upon me, blackguard! I defy you!
TODO:I can survive endless blight! Cast it upon me!
TODO:Injury is the source of infection... sweet infection.
TODO:Finally... the doctor becomes the patient!
TODO:Ah... my wounds fester... I must have MORE!
TODO:Cut me again, villain. My humours seed the night air!
TODO:Through suffering, I will know my faith!
TODO:Verse XIII: only the faithless fear death.
TODO:My mortified flesh armors me against your hate!
TODO:My blood is my penance. Take it, heretic!
TODO:Ha! The Light has already burned away all feeling!
TODO:DESTROY THIS BODY. IT IS MY CAGE.
TODO:STRIP AWAY THE MORTAL FLESH. SEE MY GLORY.
TODO:AM'YOGHN KTAH MYEP NGORHEM. NYARLATHOTEP FOGRAAHG.
TODO:WOUND THIS PATHETIC CREATURE. IT BEGS FOR DEATH.
TODO:I WILL GORGE MYSELF ON THIS BODY'S BLOOD. KRT'RAGHN MYA.
TODO:Come, foul denizens of the night! Do your worst!
TODO:There's no wound a half-gallon of absinthe won't cure.
TODO:What's a bruise or two, in the face of such plunder?
TODO:Pshaw! I know a lovely doctor who owes me a favour...
TODO:You cannot harm one whom society has left for dead...
TODO:Hmph. Blood's merely an expense in my line of work.
TODO:Pain? (snort)
TODO:Let them come.
TODO:...
TODO:You wound me, and I'll be impressed.
TODO:Nothing refreshes the spirit like one's own blood!
TODO:These scars will prove my worth.
TODO:Bloody me! I crave it! KAH-LEEEEEE-YAAAAAA!
TODO:Carve away the fat 'til only a warrior remains!
TODO:Let them ply their dark trade. My soul is invincible.
TODO:Heh heh heh heh. Heh. Heh-heh. Heh. Heh.
TODO:AAAAA-HAAAAA!
TODO:Torture? (shrugs) I'm always game for a little fun.
TODO:Oh, you like knives? Me too... Heh.
TODO:Yes, drain my blood. I tire of this... "life."
TODO:She eats only what she makes, the ailing dowager.
TODO:To the lizard, it is clear: sacrifice or death.
TODO:Pain is an affectation. Only death is real.
TODO:Carve away the numb flesh and expose the man within.
TODO:The dead long for torture -- to FEEL once more!
TODO:Let the blows fall! Strategy is born in blood!
TODO:Another scar is no difference!
TODO:The sting of injury dulls the grief for my brothers!
TODO:Wounds are the wages of battle, and I LIKE to get paid!
TODO:The searing pain is a most invigorating fire!
TODO:Give me more! I've endured worse!
TODO:The pain focuses my aim!
TODO:Wounds heal but glory never fades!
TODO:Ah what a bloody delight to do battle!
TODO:The agony quickens the pulse!
TODO:Blood makes the hunt more thrilling!
TODO:I can take a beating - come on!
TODO:Pain sharpens our senses, doesn't it, girl?
TODO:Crime made poignant through flayed flesh and mortified bruises!
TODO:The law is held fast by the blood of lawmen!
TODO:Now I will know the dark delight of bloodletting, as it does!
TODO:Each scar is a blissful lesson to be meditated upon.
TODO:Blood will transmute me! Transmute us all!
TODO:Perhaps this violence will soothe it, keep it sleeping...
TODO:Finally the pain promised by what whispers dark inside me!
TODO:Pain! Make of me your quarry!
TODO:My blood will lure them out!
TODO:The thrill of the chase! The ecstacy of pain!
TODO:Sweet, oh sweetest agony!
TODO:Rend me! Gore me!
TODO:My eyes are opened to new pleasures!
TODO:Let my skin weep blood!
TODO:Bathe me in gore and battle!
TODO:Only the sufferer appreciates the beauty of the whip...
TODO:Break me on your wheel, glorious and terrible Fortune!
TODO:Stand in my way and I will smite you down!
TODO:I could have done this alone! I SHOULD have!
TODO:You are ALL consigned to hell! ALL OF YOU!
TODO:Fester and die, heathens!
TODO:You sick, unholy vermin! You stain my honor!
TODO:I will survive this expedition, no thanks to you weaklings!
TODO:Tread on my heels again, I'll run you through.
TODO:Greenhorns. Feh!
TODO:Gah... You reek of warm outhouse.
TODO:I'd rather adventure alone than with you lot. Feh.
TODO:You are all mewling babes. I will show you strength!
TODO:Silence! Or I'll expose you all to corrosive humours!
TODO:Your wake bears the linger of rotting flesh...
TODO:You halfwits are interrupting my concentration!
TODO:Uneducated brutes! The ignorance! The idiocy!
TODO:I am chosen - you are nothing!
TODO:May the Light bring courage to you pathetic cast-offs!
TODO:Stop soiling yourself and fight!
TODO:Blasphemers! You offend my ears AND my eyes!
TODO:That I should be made to breathe the air AND your stink.. Appalling!
TODO:COWER, FOOLS. CHMOR BROGH PHTREEA LROM. HA HASSA.
TODO:They cannot begin to guess Its power.
TODO:You boorish brigands are an insult to the human intellect.
TODO:There exists techniques to treat all flavors of idiocy...
TODO:RLMARG AROMPHA TRAMAL. YOUR DEATHS ARE IRRELEVANT.
TODO:Stand away from me, you beggars!
TODO:My allies' dank musk will disguise me well.
TODO:None of you beslubbering dewberries can be trusted...
TODO:Pray tell how I ended up out here with these half-wits?
TODO:You lot render me positively queenly. I approve.
TODO:Foul brigands!
TODO:Blackguards, all!
TODO:You tenderfoot fools!
TODO:Anger me and you roll the dice.
TODO:...
TODO:City-folk... War is for warriors!
TODO:The civilized world is weak. Such a disappointment.
TODO:Not one of you knows battle like my people...
TODO:These others lack spirit. They will not survive...
TODO:They won't spar with me because they fear pain. Fools.
TODO:HA HAA HAAAAAA! (spits)
TODO:(snort, spit) There, that's my opinion.
TODO:You can all die. Simple as that.
TODO:I am in like company. Unfortunately for them.
TODO:Be polite? Would rather die of plague.
TODO:The human race is a litter; these, the runts.
TODO:They rush, these lemmings, to the cliff's edge...
TODO:Even dogs know when the meat is tainted...
TODO:You fight death like a child fights aging.
TODO:Yes... pray. What we need now is more noise.
TODO:To me, weaklings! Watch and learn!
TODO:Am I the only one here who has been in battle?!
TODO:Truth is, most of you won't survive this.
TODO:You are like a gaggle of pathetic recruits!
TODO:Incompetent fools!
TODO:My herbs and stitches are wasted on you louts!
TODO:Surrounded by untrained dolts!
TODO:You are just the meat between my arbalest and our foes.
TODO:Dullards! You will not last another hour!
TODO:You couldn't handle the road I have ridden, louts!
TODO:Rats! Snitches!
TODO:You all make for a sordid lineup, indeed!
TODO:Time for a shakedown, you louts!
TODO:Have none of you dogs been trained?
TODO:Lawless brutes - all of you!
TODO:Bung it up again and I'll awaken it!
TODO:You vex me worse than my mortal affliction!
TODO:You look like rejects from an opium den's lavatory bucket.
TODO:All I see around me is dangerous incompetence.
TODO:What a cruel twist of fate to be stuck with you mummers.
TODO:None of you could attend to my attendants!
TODO:You jeopardize this hunt and I will have my prize!
TODO:None of you are barely fit to feed the fire!
TODO:A hunting party composed of rats and mules, how truly formidable!
TODO:I wouldn't let you brush the dung from my boots!
TODO:Illiterate bumpkins - feh!
TODO:If only I could sell your skins, that I might profit marginally from having met you.
TODO:I wish I could truly express the misery you all cause me!
TODO:We stand to perish because of you dullards!
TODO:You are the roots of this tree of woe!
TODO:I claim this victory for the church!
TODO:I have sacrificed much... Now I shall claim all!
TODO:Count the gold again. I have tithes to pay.
TODO:Let me shoulder the gold. My aura will exorcise it.
TODO:Self above else!
TODO:All for one! And the one is me, naturally.
TODO:So long as there's gold to be had, I'll cut on command.
TODO:A talent as splendid as my own hardly comes cheap...
TODO:A penny pilfered is a penny earned!
TODO:If anyone gets out alive, it will be me!
TODO:Perhaps the party would make a donation to my research?
TODO:Surely you find my experiments to be of great value...
TODO:My fees just increased. Don't question me -- I am a doctor!
TODO:Save the physic first! Else who will maintain your vigor?
TODO:The Light guides me, and only me.
TODO:Pay a donation to the church and I will bless your weapon.
TODO:Cast aside your gods. Mine alone is the one holy Light.
TODO:Give me your jewels and I will absolve you of idolatry.
TODO:Collection plate! Please give freely!
TODO:Yes, I am on sabbatical. E'en so, I do not work for free.
TODO:If they filch one penny from me, I'll burn them alive.
TODO:Little lucre always comes in handy, tenured though I am...
TODO:Let me study the artifacts. Few others are qualified.
TODO:This is not my fair share. I know - I have studied maths.
TODO:Best let me appraise the loot. I have an eye for jewels!
TODO:These hook-fingered brutes are fleecing me, I know it.
TODO:Twenty-five percent... laughable! I am worth a fortune!
TODO:I am no child slave. I deserve a Lady's recompense!
TODO:What an attractive bauble... Mine!
TODO:Oops - was my take the largest? Shame that.
TODO:I make my own luck. Especially when no one's looking.
TODO:I take what I wish.
TODO:One hay-penny short... Someone is going to die.
TODO:Fun... but I don't do this for free.
TODO:They steal my kill again, I'll collect on the debt.
TODO:Leave them to me! Leave them ALL to me!
TODO:Glory is wasted on them! I claim my due!
TODO:True, I am here for the glory. But a warrior must eat.
TODO:Whosoever bleeds the most ought to benefit the most...
TODO:I am not the only performer here. Just the most qualified.
TODO:For twenty-five percent, I give twenty-five percent.
TODO:No, I did not touch the coin purse. ... Hee-hee.
TODO:One quarter? Surely you jest.
TODO:If I must be paid in coinage, make it A LOT of coinage.
TODO:Alms for the sick?
TODO:Ants at a spring picnic. Wine spilled in the heath.
TODO:I fight at the fore. Who better to lead a suicide-charge?
TODO:All cloth we scavenge goes to me. I have needs...
TODO:Give me your spoils - I suffer more hardship than you can know!
TODO:Don't you dare forget who has been keeping us all alive!
TODO:Maybe I'll reveal my strategems, maybe I won't.
TODO:I am the backbone of this unit!
TODO:I am the ranking officer!
TODO:They think I am old and cannot count my coin. Fools.
TODO:I do in one shot what takes you a dozen swings.
TODO:I deserve twice as much as you inefficient louts.
TODO:My aim grows more true as my share increases.
TODO:It seems I am the only one truly made for this adventure!
TODO:You need me to watch the flanks!
TODO:The hound comes first. Then me. Then you...
TODO:Pay me my retainer - I've long since quit the force.
TODO:Our loyalty deserves a larger share.
TODO:I have double the expenses, I want double the pay.
TODO:The two of us are worth more than twelve of you!
TODO:I claim this victory for the brothel!
TODO:I am literally twice the threat of any of you.
TODO:None of you exhibit the discipline needed.
TODO:Don't be surprised to find me gone on the morrow.
TODO:Just remember: the more gold I get, the less of IT you'll see.
TODO:This is my hunt and woe if you forget that!
TODO:Be grateful! They may name you when they sing my songs!
TODO:This expedition deserves a worthy leader! Me!
TODO:Step aside, I have trained under those who survived the Lost Jungle!
TODO:My attendants have outfitted me with the most lethal accoutrements!
TODO:Your envy is obvious! And stay out of my way!
TODO:Whatever I find belongs to me - whatever you find...belongs to me!
TODO:My expertise confers me the largest share!
TODO:I deserve better than this!
TODO:More...more! I must find more!
TODO:Can so much death ever truly be justified?
TODO:How can I fight for truth when I betray all I love?
TODO:Why did I trade her for this life? She loved me...
TODO:The dice have no more jump.
TODO:Go, go on! Lead me to my doom!
TODO:This cursed place will be my tomb.
TODO:The things I've done. They pale by comparison...
TODO:I can't get their faces out of my head...
TODO:Sorrow and toil...sorrow and toil.
TODO:Those fools will never respect my work...
TODO:So cold inside. Like a morgue.
TODO:I have nothing... I offer little more than a corpse.
TODO:These tests are fruitless! I verge on failure!
TODO:There is no higher purpose here...
TODO:This mission frays my spirits...
TODO:Why does everyone hate me? Even the mother superior...
TODO:Even the destitute of spirit refuse the Light. Why?
TODO:Verse LXVIII: Pray to the Light, for it will grant you joy...
TODO:Leave me alone! Leave me to my commandeered mind!
TODO:I will never escape It. I will suffocate first.
TODO:I toyed with greatness -- now I suffer eternally.
TODO:They must never know what I am becoming... Never.
TODO:The beast is unhinging my mind. Dark fantasies emerge...
TODO:Curse this life. Still, 'tis my own doing...
TODO:Seems I've been sentenced to dawdle with oafish cut-purses.
TODO:I was a Lady once. Now, little more than a burglar.
TODO:Blazes. Imagine if I'd been content with what I had...
TODO:"A bird in the hand," the judge said. Sigh.
TODO:...
TODO:Life. What a pot of dung.
TODO:... Shoulda written a will.
TODO:Lucky I've lived this long, I suppose.
TODO:Been luckier'n most. But luck always runs out.
TODO:Where flies the warhawk? It abandons my soul...
TODO:My spirit longs for the open air I'll never breathe again.
TODO:There is no honor in these lands... It pains me.
TODO:The spirits all whisper of failure...
TODO:No! Do not ponder death! That way lies defeat...
TODO:What a sad display, us lumbering apes.
TODO:All this leather and steel and blood... for what?
TODO:We stink of will and confidence. What a crock.
TODO:We think we have purpose here? A noble venture? HA!
TODO:Just another sick demonstration of hubris. (snort)
TODO:A crack in the chamber room window. Snow swirls in...
TODO:Cobwebs in the dining hall. Weevils in the crust!
TODO:The blade is broken.
TODO:Even steel may shatter in the cold.
TODO:We march only to ruin.
TODO:I cannot bear the weight of keeping you all alive.
TODO:When did I become Death's right hand?
TODO:I am a dull weapon wielded by the wicked hand of Fate!
TODO:I am haunted by visions of my betrayed men!
TODO:I knew only to follow orders! Forgive me brothers!
TODO:What is it I ran away from?
TODO:What a fool I was to try and prove myself!
TODO:My aim is as faulty as my heart!
TODO:Grim thoughts circle my head like buzzards!
TODO:My string is frayed, my soul quails.
TODO:Her tails hang low, the trail is lost.
TODO:Law and order - they are delusions.
TODO:Bah, the trail's gone cold.
TODO:What can one man do in the face of such rampant corruption?!
